tool_description: Calculates optimal nozzle geometry including expansion ratio, exit diameter, and contour profile for maximum thrust efficiency at specified operating conditions.

throat_diameter.description: Nozzle throat diameter in meters (0.001 to 5.0)

ambient_pressure.description: External ambient pressure in bar (0.0 to 1.1)

gamma.description: Specific heat ratio of combustion products (1.1 to 1.4)

nozzle_type.description: Nozzle configuration: conical, bell, aerospike, plug

half_angle.description: Nozzle half angle in degrees for conical type (5.0 to 30.0)

error_messages: Throat diameter out of range: Value must be between 0.001 and 5.0 meters
Chamber pressure out of range: Value must be between 1.0 and 300.0 bar
Ambient pressure out of range: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.1 bar
Gamma out of range: Specific heat ratio must be between 1.1 and 1.4
Invalid nozzle type: Must be one of [conical, bell, aerospike, plug]
Half angle out of range: Value must be between 5.0 and 30.0 degrees for conical nozzles
Pressure ratio invalid: Chamber pressure must be greater than ambient pressure
usage: Provide throat_diameter from chamber design, chamber_pressure, and ambient_pressure for operating environment. Optionally specify gamma, nozzle_type, and half_angle. Tool calculates optimal expansion geometry for maximum performance.

expansion_ratio.description: Nozzle area expansion ratio (exit area / throat area)

thrust_coefficient.description: Theoretical thrust coefficient for given conditions
